name: Flare Network
introduce: Flare is a Layer-1 blockchain which enables secure universal interoperability between chains - scaling the use of blockchain by enabling all digital assets and onchain information to flow freely. With the consensus protocol for external data, decentralized applications on Flare can safely and trustlessly acquire and use information from other blockchains and real world data sources, solving the oracle problem and opening the door to a new era of utility.
